attributes.action: Allow parents to vote on behalf of their children until their children reach 18 years
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Ever wondered what is wrong with the country?

Once upon a time, women could not vote. Go back further and men couldn't vote unless they were wealthy. Go back further still, and nobody had a vote.

Are we better off because of these moves towards democracy?

If so, why not complete the process by ensuring that children's interests are represented in elections.

I don't have to spell out the difference such a reform would make to the way we are all governed, but if you are a parent, or are planning to become one then ask yourself this question.

Have recent governments been busy making this country a better place for my children to grow up in?

If the answer is no, then give politicians a reason to listen to the concerns of parents and others who want a decent future for this country.

This petition can bring about the changes needed to make this country a safer and happier place; a true democracy.
